item.title: Social Media Internships @ Electrosocial
item.description: It gives me immensure pleasure to announce that Electrosocial is starting a six week internship program from the end of this month. The program is aimed at sharing the fundamentals of Social Media and imparting working knowledge with various tools and services of relevance. The internship would be completely online so that anyone from any part of the world can join it. The internship program would consist of (but not limited to) the following: Emergence of Social Media Social Media Fundamentals Social Media Tools Social Media Values/Ethics Scope of Social Media in Marketing, Customer Service, Activism etc Social Media Metrics Legal Aspect of Social Media
